questions.question: Set in a samurai country closed off from the world, this arc features a rebellion against a Shogun and an Emperor of the Sea. What is...?
This arc is where Luffy first demonstrates Gear Second and Gear Third while battling against CP9. What is...?
This arc sees the Straw Hat Pirates participating in a gladiator-style tournament on an island ruled by a Warlord of the Sea. What is...?
This form of Haki allows the user to predict an opponent's moves and sense their presence, even if they are hidden. What is...?
This ability, used by a former Warlord of the Sea, allows the manipulation of shadows. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to control, produce, and become mochi. What is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a skilled swordsman who wields three swords and aspires to become the world's greatest swordsman. Who is...?
This character, a princess of the Fish-Man Island, has the ability to communicate with sea kings. Who is...?
This captain of the Red Hair Pirates is known for his laid-back demeanor and being one of the Four Emperors. Who is...?
